item.title: 礼来公司合作伙伴 BioAge 申请在美国上市
item.description: 与礼来公司（Eli Lilly）合作开发肥胖症疗法的生物技术初创公司 BioAge Labs 周二表示，该公司已申请在美国首次公开募股。【原文：BioAge Labs, a biotech startup collaborating with Eli Lilly for its obesity therapy, said on Tuesday it had filed for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 星链科技称遵守巴西禁止访问 X 的命令
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的卫星宽带公司 Starlink 周二表示，该公司正在遵守巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）的命令，禁止在该国访问社交媒体平台 X。【原文：Elon Musk's satellite broadband company, Starlink, on Tuesday said that it is complying with Brazil's top court judge Alexandre de Moraes' order to block access to social media platform X in the country.】

item.title: 九月伊始，美国股市暴跌，投资者对芯片持冷淡态度
item.description: 周二，华尔街主要股指下滑，S&P 500 指数跌幅超过 2%，纳斯达克综合指数跌幅超过 3%，原因是投资者对人工智能的乐观情绪有所减弱，而在不温不火的经济数据公布后，大盘抛售加速。基准 S&P 500 指数、纳斯达克和道指创下 8 月初以来的最大单日跌幅。【原文：Wall Street's main indexes slid on Tuesday, with the S&P 500 down more than 2% and the Nasdaq Composite down over 3% as investors softened their optimism about AI in a broad market sell-off that accelerated after tepid economic data. The benchmark S&P 500 index, Nasdaq and Dow registered their biggest daily drop since early August.】

item.title: Unite Here 工会称美国 7 个城市仍有 9,300 多名工人在罢工
item.description: Unite Here 工会周二称，美国七个城市的 9376 名酒店员工仍在罢工，而巴尔的摩和西雅图的罢工已经结束。【原文：The Unite Here union said on Tuesday 9,376 of U.S. hotel workers have remained on strike in seven cities, while strikes in Baltimore and Seattle have concluded.】

item.title: 劳动节后美国企业借款人涌入债券市场
item.description: 周二，美国企业借款人涌入投资级和垃圾债券市场，抢在美联储本月利率决定和即将到来的美国总统大选的预期市场波动之前。【原文：U.S. corporate borrowers flooded the investment-grade and junk bond market on Tuesday, getting ahead of expected market volatility on this month's rates decision by the Federal Reserve and the upcoming U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 驾驶季节结束，石油价格暴跌，美国汽油价格跌至近三年低点
item.description: 美国汽油期货周二下跌近6%，创下自2021年12月以来的最低点，原因是驾驶季节的结束拖累了汽车燃料的需求，而更广泛的石油市场则出现抛售。【原文：U.S. gasoline futures fell nearly 6% on Tuesday to their lowest since December 2021, as the end of the driving season weighed on demand for the motor fuel amid a sell-off in the broader oil market.】

item.title: 投资者暂停人工智能涨势，英伟达和芯片指数下跌
item.description: 周二，人工智能重量级公司英伟达（Nvidia）的股价暴跌，华尔街芯片指数暴跌7%，原因是在经济数据不温不火的大背景下，投资者对人工智能的乐观情绪有所减弱。【原文：Shares of AI heavyweight Nvidia tumbled on Tuesday, with Wall Street's chip index slumping 7% as investors softened their optimism about AI in a broad market sell-off following tepid economic data.】

item.title: 高盛称人工智能可能在未来十年拖累油价
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）周二表示，人工智能可能会通过改善物流降低成本，增加可盈利的可采资源量，从而促进供应，从而在未来十年损害石油价格。【原文：Artificial intelligence could hurt oil prices over the next decade by boosting supply by potentially reducing costs via improved logistics and increasing the amount of profitably recoverable resources, Goldman Sachs said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪否认暂停墨西哥建厂计划
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周二表示，该公司没有推迟有关在墨西哥建厂计划的 "任何决定"，否认了当天早些时候的报道。【原文：China's electric automaker BYD said on Tuesday that it has not postponed "any decision" regarding its planned factory in Mexico, denying a report from earlier in the day.】

item.title: 花旗集团聘请 Achintya Mangla 主管投资银行融资业务
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份备忘录，花旗集团已聘请 Achintya Mangla 担任投资银行融资主管，这个新设立的职位将向银行主管 Viswas Raghavan 汇报工作。【原文：Citigroup has hired Achintya Mangla as head of financing for investment banking, a newly created role that will report to the head of banking Viswas Raghavan, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 弗里波特液化天然气公司产量增加，美国 8 月液化天然气出口反弹
item.description: 金融公司 LSEG 周二提供的初步数据显示，8 月份美国液化天然气出口反弹走高，原因是美国第二大液化天然气出口设施在停运后产量上升，其他工厂的维护活动也有所减少。【原文：Exports of U.S. liquefied natural gas bounced higher in August as output from the country's second-largest export facility rose following an outage and maintenance activities at other plants wound down, preliminary data from financial firm LSEG showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储文件称未来一年美国住房通胀可能下降
item.description: 据旧金山联邦储备银行周二发布的研究报告称，随着房屋供需差距的缩小，美国住房通胀在未来一年可能会有所缓解。【原文：U.S. housing inflation is likely to ease in the coming year as the gap between supply and demand for homes narrows, according to research published on Tuesday by the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特任命吉普北美公司新负责人，并作出其他高管变动
item.description: 汽车制造商斯泰兰特周二任命鲍勃-布罗德多夫（Bob Broderdorf）为吉普北美地区负责人。【原文：Automaker Stellantis on Tuesday named Bob Broderdorf as the head of Jeep North America.】

item.title: 摆脱破产保护后，Rite Aid 将作为私营公司运营
item.description: 美国连锁药店 Rite Aid 周二表示，在成功完成财务重组并摆脱破产保护后，该公司将作为一家私营公司运营。【原文：U.S. drugstore chain Rite Aid said on Tuesday it would operate as a private company as it successfully completed its financial restructuring and emerged from Chapter 11 bankruptcy.】

item.title: 新丰泰能源公司获准向非自由贸易协定国家出口液化天然气
item.description: 新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy）周二表示，该公司已获得美国能源部的授权，可以向非自由贸易协定国家出口液化天然气。【原文：New Fortress Energy said on Tuesday it has received authorization from the U.S. Department of Energy to export liquefied natural gas to non-free trade agreement countries.】

item.title: 伯克希尔减持美国银行股份高达 60 亿美元，分析师称巴菲特在预订利润
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）在美国第二大银行股价强劲上涨后抛售了总价值超过 60 亿美元的美国银行股票，一些分析师认为获利回吐是抛售股票的核心原因。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway has offloaded Bank of America shares worth more than a combined $6 billion following a strong run in the second-largest U.S. lender's stock, with some analysts seeing profit-taking at the heart of the share sales.】

item.title: 富国银行下调波音股票评级，称其现金流目标将推迟实现
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）表示，波音公司每年 100 亿美元的自由现金流目标可能会推迟约两年，即推迟到 2027-28 年，而且在开发新型飞机之前，波音公司必须筹集 300 亿美元的资金，并下调了该公司的股票评级。【原文：Boeing's annual free cash flow target of $10 billion may be delayed by about two years to 2027-28 and it would have to raise $30 billion before developing a new aircraft, Wells Fargo said and downgraded the stock.】

item.title: 人工智能服务器制造商超微否认卖空者兴登堡的说法
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）周二否认了做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）在上周报告中的说法，称报告中包含了关于这家人工智能服务器制造商的 "虚假或不准确的陈述"。【原文：Super Micro Computer on Tuesday denied claims made by short-seller Hindenburg Research in its report last week and said it contained "false or inaccurate statements" about the AI server maker.】

item.title: 美国机构报告自 2009 年以来第 28 起高田气囊气体发生器致死事件
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，已确认这是美国自 2009 年以来第 28 起因高田气囊气体发生器缺陷而导致的死亡事故。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday it had confirmed the 28th death in the United States stemming from a defective Takata air bag inflator since 2009.】

item.title: 美国 7 月份建筑支出降幅超过预期
item.description: 由于抵押贷款增加和供应增加拖累了单户住宅建设，7 月份美国建筑支出降幅超过预期。【原文：U.S. construction spending fell more than expected in July as higher mortgages and increased supply weighed on single-family homebuilding.】

item.title: 8 月份美国制造业从 8 个月低点回升，但趋势依然疲软
item.description: 由于就业情况有所改善，上个月美国制造业指数从 7 月份的八个月低点略有回升，但总体趋势仍表明工厂活动低迷。【原文：A gauge of U.S. manufacturing edged up last month from an eight-month low in July amid some improvement in employment, but the overall trend continued to point to subdued factory activity.】

item.title: 星座品牌公司将记录高达 25 亿美元的葡萄酒业务相关费用
item.description: 科罗娜（Corona）啤酒制造商星座品牌（Constellation Brands）周二表示，在经历了几个季度的美国需求疲软之后，该公司将减记葡萄酒和烈酒业务的价值，并在本季度计提高达 25 亿美元的费用。【原文：Constellation Brands will write down the value of its wine and spirits business and take up to a $2.5 billion charge in the current quarter, the Corona beer maker said on Tuesday, following several quarters of weak demand in the U.S.】

item.title: 高盛暂时停止对锌的报道
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）"暂时 "停止了对锌市场的投资，理由是今年早些时候锌行业主管离职后 "能力受限"。【原文：Goldman Sachs has suspended covering zinc markets "for the moment", citing "restricted capacity" following the departure of the sector lead earlier this year.】

item.title: 信中称 Glas Trust 可能无权在 Byju 破产案中代表美国贷款人行事
item.description: 总部位于美国的格拉斯信托公司（Glas Trust）在一封信中表示，该公司的法院指定官员可能无权代表贷款人，这些贷款人正在破产程序中向印度教育科技巨头 Byju's 寻求超过 10 亿美元的贷款。【原文：U.S.-based Glas Trust may not have the authority to represent lenders who are seeking more than $1 billion from Indian ed-tech giant Byju's under an insolvency process, the court-appointed officer running the company said in a letter.】

item.title: 巴西 HBR 房地产公司对 WeWork 提起驱逐诉讼
item.description: 巴西房地产公司 HBR Realty 在周二提交的一份证券文件中称，由于未收到付款，该公司已对灵活工作空间提供商 WeWork 提起驱逐诉讼。【原文：Brazilian real estate firm HBR Realty has filed an eviction action against flexible workspace provider WeWork due to lack of payment, HBR said in a securities filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 从和平缔造者到禁忌破坏者，大众汽车老板布卢姆与工会斗智斗勇
item.description: 大众汽车老板奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）已经在与电动汽车需求放缓和中国竞争对手作斗争，现在他必须放下团队合作的架子，去对付另一个强劲的对手--德国强大的工会。【原文：Volkswagen boss Oliver Blume, already battling slowing demand for electric cars and Chinese rivals, must now put aside his mantle as team player to tackle yet another tough opponent, Germany's powerful labour unions.】

item.title: 穆迪将全球再保险公司的展望从稳定上调至积极
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）在周二的一份声明中表示，由于再保险公司的价格上涨、政策更加严格以及投资收益健康，该公司将全球再保险公司的评级展望从稳定上调至积极。【原文：Moody's Ratings upgraded its outlook on global reinsurers to positive from stable owing to reinsurers' higher prices and more restrictive policies, along with healthy investment income, the ratings agency said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 尽管降息，加拿大房价仍将因需求低迷而小幅上涨：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）调查的分析师称，尽管预期会有更多次降息，但加拿大的房价在 2024 年将几乎不会上涨，在未来几年也只会小幅上涨。【原文：Home prices in Canada will barely rise in 2024 and only modestly in coming years despite expectations for many more interest rate cuts, with affordability improving but remaining stretched, according to analysts polled by Reuters.】

item.title: 游戏开发商育碧因《星球大战外传》反响平平而业绩下滑
item.description: 法国视频游戏制造商育碧（Ubisoft）周二股价连续第二天下跌，原因是该公司最近推出的两款游戏表现低迷，其中包括期待已久的《星球大战外传》（Star Wars Outlaws）。【原文：Shares in French video game maker Ubisoft fell on Tuesday for a second consecutive day following a sluggish performance of its two recent releases, including the long-awaited "Star Wars Outlaws".】

item.title: Airbnb 要求纽约市重新考虑短租法规
item.description: Airbnb 周二要求纽约市重新考虑将于 2023 年 9 月生效的短租法规，理由是旅客价格上涨和对住房市场的影响为零。【原文：Airbnb on Tuesday asked New York City to reconsider regulations on short-term rentals that went into effect in September 2023, citing higher prices for travelers and zero impact on the housing market.】
